Quest.JP-Detail: 1週間の全力出撃を行い、可能な限り多くの敵艦隊を捕捉、これを迎撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie your fleet 36 times, encounter 24 bosses, defeat 12 bosses and get 6 Perfect S rank victories.

Quest.JP-Detail: 新たに編成した「第２艦隊」を出撃させよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie your 2nd Fleet on a combat mission.

Quest.JP-Name: 敵艦隊主力を撃滅せよ！
Quest.JP-Detail: 艦隊を出撃させ、敵艦隊「主力」を捕捉！これを撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sink a flagship of any enemy fleet.

Quest.JP-Detail: 敵機動部隊を捕捉し、これを邀撃、敵空母を轟沈せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sink an enemy aircraft carrier (CV/CVL).

Quest.JP-Name: 敵補給艦を3隻撃沈せよ！
Quest.JP-Detail: 艦隊を出撃させ、敵補給艦を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sink 3 enemy transport ships.

Quest.JP-Detail: 新編成した「三川艦隊」で出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with Choukai (鳥海), Aoba (青葉), Kako (加古), Furutaka (古鷹), Tenryuu (天龍) and another fast ship.

Quest.JP-Detail: 有力な母艦航空隊で1週間の全力出撃を行い、可能な限り多くの敵空母を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sink 20 enemy aircraft carriers (CV/CVL).

Quest.JP-Detail: 1週間の全力出撃を行い、敵輸送船団を捕捉・撃滅、敵の補給路を寸断せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sink 50 enemy transport ships.

Quest.JP-Detail: 「暁」「響」「雷」「電」による第六駆逐隊、出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with ONLY Akatsuki (暁), Hibiki (響), Inazuma (電), and Ikazuchi (雷).

Quest.JP-Detail: 「愛宕」「高雄」「鳥海」「摩耶」を基幹とする第四戦隊で、バシー島沖の敵を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with Atago (愛宕), Takao (高雄), Choukai (鳥海), Maya (摩耶) and any 2 ships. Score a victory against World 2-2 Boss.

Quest.JP-Detail: 「扶桑」「山城」「最上」「時雨」を基幹とする西村艦隊で、オリョール海の敵を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with Fusou (扶桑改二), Yamashiro (山城改二), Mogami (最上), Shigure (時雨) and any 2 ships. Score a victory against World 2-3 Boss.

Quest.JP-Detail: 「翔鶴」「瑞鶴」を基幹とする第五航空戦隊で、北方海域モーレイ海の敵を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with Shoukaku (翔鶴), Zuikaku (瑞鶴) and any 4 ships. Score a victory against World 3-1 Boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 南西諸島海域の制海権を握れ！
Quest.TR-Name: Bd7: Gain Control of the Nansei Islands
Quest.JP-Detail: 艦隊を南西諸島海域に全力出撃させ、多数の敵艦隊「主力」群を捕捉、撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Defeat 5 bosses in World 2.

Quest.TR-Name: B16: Sortie the New Mikawa Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 完全編成した「三川艦隊」をもって、オリョール海の敵を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with Choukai (鳥海), Aoba (青葉), Kinugasa (衣笠), Kako (加古), Furutaka (古鷹) and Tenryuu (天龍). Score a victory against World 2-3 Boss.

Quest.JP-Detail: 有力な対潜能力を持つ海上護衛隊によって、可能な限り多くの敵潜水艦を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sink 15 enemy submarines.

Quest.JP-Name: 敵東方艦隊を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: Bw6: Eliminate the Enemy's Eastern Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 西方海域に出撃し、敵東方艦隊の主力を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Defeat 12 bosses in World 4.

Quest.JP-Detail: 対潜能力の充実した艦隊で出撃、敵潜水艦狩りを実施せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sink 6 enemy submarines.

Quest.JP-Detail: 伊号潜水艦2隻からなる潜水艦隊でオリョール海の敵を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with 2 SS and 4 additional ships. Score a victory against World 2-3 Boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 「航空水上打撃艦隊」出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B18: Sortie a Naval Aviation Strike Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 航空戦艦2隻と航空巡洋艦2隻を基幹とする艦隊でカレー洋の制海権を握れ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with 2 BBV, 2 CAV and 2 additional ships. Score a victory against World 4-2 Boss.

Quest.JP-Detail: 編成した「第六戦隊」をもって出撃し、オリョール海の敵を撃滅「完全勝利」せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with Furutaka (古鷹), Kako (加古), Kinugasa (衣笠), Aoba (青葉) and 2 additional ships. Score a S rank victory against World 2-3 Boss.

Quest.JP-Detail: 編成した「第八駆逐隊」を含む艦隊で出撃し、オリョール海の敵を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with Asashio (朝潮), Michishio (満潮), Ooshio (大潮), Arashio (荒潮) and 2 additional ships. Score a victory against World 2-3 Boss.

Quest.JP-Detail: 編成した「第十八駆逐隊」を含む艦隊で出撃し、北方海域モーレイ海の敵を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with Kasumi (霞), Arare (霰), Kagerou (陽炎), Shiranui (不知火) and 2 additional ships. Score a victory against World 3-1 Boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 敵北方艦隊主力を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: Bw7: Eliminate the Main Forces of the Enemy's Northern Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 北方海域の深部に出撃し、敵北方艦隊の主力艦隊を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Defeat 5 bosses in Worlds 3-3, 3-4 or 3-5.

Quest.JP-Name: 敵東方中枢艦隊を撃破せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: Bw8: Crush the Core of the Eastern Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 西方海域カスガダマ島沖に出撃し、敵東方中枢艦隊を捕捉、これを撃破せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Defeat World 4-4 boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 南方海域珊瑚諸島沖の制空権を握れ！
Quest.TR-Name: Bw9: Seize Air Superiority in the South
Quest.JP-Detail: 南方海域珊瑚諸島沖に出撃し、敵機動部隊本体を捕捉撃滅、これに完全勝利せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Score two S rank victories at the boss node of World 5-2.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第三十駆逐隊(第一次)」出撃せよ！
Quest.JP-Detail: 「第三十駆逐隊(第一次)」を含む艦隊で出撃し、キス島沖の主力艦隊と交戦せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet that consists of Mutsuki (睦月), Kisaragi (如月), Yayoi (弥生), Mochizuki (望月) and up to 2 additional DD to World 3-2 and encounter the boss. C rank or above is required.

Quest.JP-Detail: 練度の高い(Lv.90～99)第一艦隊旗艦で出撃し、オリョール海の暁に勝利を刻め！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with a high level (Lv.90~99) flagship to 2-3 obtain an S rank victory against the boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 二人でする初めての任務！
Quest.JP-Detail: 強い絆を結んだ艦娘を旗艦とした第一艦隊でリランカ島へ出撃、敵中枢を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet to 4-3 with a bonded ship of Lv.100 or more as flagship and score an S rank victory against the boss.

Quest.TR-Name: B23: Sortie an Aviation Battleship Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 航空戦艦2隻を基幹とする艦隊で、西方海域カスガダマ島の敵勢力を撃破せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Have 2 BBV ships in your main fleet and score a victory against World 4-4 Boss.

Quest.JP-Detail: 「第三十駆逐隊(第二次)」は直ちに抜錨！鎮守府正面の対潜哨戒を実施せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Mutsuki (睦月), Yayoi (弥生), Uzuki (卯月) and Mochizuki (望月) to World 1-5 and reach the boss, scoring at least a C rank.

Quest.JP-Detail: 「第五戦隊」は沖ノ島沖の戦闘哨戒を実施、敵艦隊主力を捕捉、これを撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Myoukou (妙高), Nachi (那智) and Haguro (羽黒) to World 2-5. You may add 3 other ships. Score an S rank victory against the boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 新編「第二航空戦隊」出撃せよ！
Quest.JP-Detail: 新編「二航戦」を基幹とした艦隊で、珊瑚諸島沖に出撃、敵機動部隊を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Hiryuu Kai2 (飛龍改二) as the flagship, Souryuu (蒼龍) and 2 DD to World 5-2. You may add 2 other ships. Score an S rank victory against the boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 精鋭「第二航空戦隊」抜錨せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B26: Sortie the Elite 2nd Carrier Division
Quest.JP-Detail: 錬成を終え再編成「二航戦」を基幹とした艦隊で、敵リランカ島を空襲、破砕せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Souryuu Kai2 (蒼龍改二) as the flagship, Hiryuu Kai2 (飛龍改二) and 2 DD to World 4-3. You may add 2 other ships. Score an S rank victory against the boss.

Quest.TR-Name: B27: Deploy a Fleet Led By Haruna
Quest.JP-Detail: 第二次改装実施した「榛名」を基幹とした艦隊で「南方海域」へ進出、敵艦隊主力を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with Haruna Kai2 (榛名改二) as the flagship and up to 5 additional ships to World 5-1 and score an S rank victory against the boss.

Quest.JP-Detail: 雲龍型航空母艦「雲龍改」含む機動部隊で珊瑚島沖に出撃、敵機動部隊を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with Unryuu Kai (雲龍改) as the flagship to World 5-2 and score an S rank victory against the boss.

Quest.TR-Name: B29: Sortie a Light Carrier Squadron
Quest.JP-Detail: 軽空母1～2隻、軽巡1隻、駆逐艦3～4隻の艦隊でカムラン半島の敵を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet of 1-2 CVL, 1 CL and 3-4 DD to World 2-1 and score an S rank victory against the boss.

Quest.JP-Name: 「水雷戦隊」バシー島沖緊急展開
Quest.TR-Name: B30: Sortie a Torpedo Squadron to Bashi Islands
Quest.JP-Detail: 軽巡を旗艦とした水雷戦隊(軽巡最大2隻他駆逐艦)でバシー島沖の敵を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet of 1-2 CL (one as the flagship) and 4-5 DD to World 2-2. Score a victory at the boss and sink the enemy flagship.

Quest.JP-Detail: 潜水艦戦力を中核とした艦隊で中部海域哨戒線へ反復出撃、敵戦力を漸減せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie to World 6-1 and obtain an S rank victory at the boss node 3 times.

Quest.JP-Detail: 軽巡旗艦の水雷戦隊(軽巡最大3隻他駆逐艦)を急派、南西諸島防衛線で敵を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet of 1-3 CL (one as the flagship) and 3-5 DD to World 1-4. Score an S rank victory against the boss.

Quest.JP-Detail: 「第二戦隊」を基幹とした艦隊でカレー洋に進出、反復出撃により敵海上兵力を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Nagato (長門), Mutsu (陸奥), Fusou (扶桑), Yamashiro (山城) and up to 2 additional ships to World 4-2. Score two S rank victories at the boss node.

Quest.TR-Name: Bm4: Surface Strike Fleet, Onwards to the South!
Quest.JP-Detail: 戦艦3隻軽巡1隻他を基幹とした水上打撃部隊で南方海域へ進出、敵艦隊を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie 3 BB/BBV (only slow battleships), 1 CL and up to 2 additional ships to World 5-1 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 「戦艦部隊」北方海域に突入せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B32: Sortie a Battleship Squadron to the Northern Sea
Quest.JP-Detail: 戦艦2隻と直援軽空母1隻(正規空母無し)基幹の艦隊で北方AL海域に突入、敵を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie 2 BB (slow or fast, BBV don't count), 1 CVL and up to 3 additional ships to World 3-5 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 海上輸送路の安全確保に努めよ！
Quest.TR-Name: Bw10: Secure the Marine Transportation Route
Quest.JP-Detail: 鎮守府正面の対潜哨戒を反復実施し、安全な海上輸送路を確保せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie to World 1-5 and score an A rank victory (or higher) at the boss node 3 times.

Quest.JP-Name: 「西村艦隊」南方海域へ進出せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B33: Sortie the Nishimura Fleet to the Southern Waters
Quest.JP-Detail: 「西村艦隊」を南方海域に進出させ、敵主力艦隊へ突入、これを撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Fusou (扶桑), Yamashiro (山城), Mogami (最上), Shigure (時雨) and Michishio (満潮) (you may also add another ship) to World 5-1 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第六戦隊」南西海域へ出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B34: Sortie the 6th Squadron to the Southwestern Waters
Quest.JP-Detail: 「古鷹」「加古」「青葉」「衣笠」を基幹とした「第六戦隊」で、沖ノ島沖の敵艦隊を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Furutaka (古鷹), Kako (加古), Aoba (青葉), Kinugasa (衣笠) and up to 2 additional ships to World 2-5 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.TR-Name: Bm6: Carrier Task Force, Onwards to the West!
Quest.JP-Detail: 航空母艦2隻(随伴駆逐艦2隻)を基幹とする空母機動艦隊で、カレー洋の敵艦隊を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet consisting of 2 CV/CVL, 2 DD and 2 additional ships to World 4-2. Score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Detail: 鎮守府正面海域の対潜哨戒を強化し、敵潜水艦を制圧、安全な海上輸送体制を確立せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet to World 1-5 and score 10 A rank (or above) victories at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Detail: 駆逐艦を旗艦とした重巡1隻軽巡1隻駆逐艦4隻からなる水上挺身部隊、沖ノ島沖に突入せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with a DD flagship, 1 CA, 1 CL and 3 more DD to World 2-5 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Detail: 「第十一駆逐隊」を含む艦隊で出撃し、オリョール海の敵を撃破せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Fubuki (吹雪), Shirayuki (白雪), Hatsuyuki (初雪), Murakumo (叢雲) and up to 2 additional ships to World 2-3 and score a victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Detail: 「第十一駆逐隊」を含む艦隊で鎮守府正面へ展開、対潜哨戒を実施せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Fubuki (吹雪), Shirayuki(白雪), Hatsuyuki (初雪) and Murakumo (叢雲) to World 1-5 and get a score of at least C at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Detail: 「第二一駆逐隊」を含む艦隊で出撃し、北方海域モーレイ海の敵を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Hatsuharu (初春), Nenohi (子日), Wakaba (若葉) and Hatsushimo (初霜) and up to 2 additional ships to World 3-1 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Detail: 「第二二駆逐隊」を含む艦隊で南西諸島防衛線に出撃、敵主力艦隊を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Satsuki (皐月), Fumizuki (文月), Nagatsuki (長月), 1 more DD and up to 2 additional ships to World 1-4 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Detail: 旗艦「那智」及び「初霜」「霞」「潮」「曙」他1隻の艦隊でバシー島沖の敵を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with Nachi (那智) as flagship, Hatsushimo (初霜), Kasumi (霞), Ushio (潮), Akebono (曙) and 1 additional ship to World 2-2 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.TR-Name: B40: Sortie the Remodelled Anti-Aircraft Heavy Cruiser
Quest.JP-Detail: 摩耶改または摩耶改二及び軽巡1駆逐2隻を含む艦隊でオリョール海の敵艦隊を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with Maya (摩耶) Kai or Kai2, 1 CL, 2 DD and up to 2 additional ships to World 2-3 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 新編「三川艦隊」ソロモン方面へ！
Quest.TR-Name: B41: Sortie the Mikawa Fleet to Solomon Islands
Quest.JP-Detail: 第一艦隊に編成した「三川艦隊」を南方海域に進出させ、同方面の敵艦隊を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie the main fleet with Choukai Kai2 (鳥海改ニ) as the flagship and any 5 of Aoba (青葉), Kinugasa (衣笠), Kako (加古), Furutaka (古鷹), Tenryuu (天龍), Yuubari (夕張) to World 5-1 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第六駆逐隊」対潜哨戒なのです！
Quest.JP-Detail: 「第六駆逐隊」を含む艦隊で鎮守府正面へ展開、対潜哨戒を実施せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Akatsuki (暁), Hibiki (響 or Верный), Inazuma (雷) and Ikazuchi (電) to World 1-5. At least C rank is required at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Detail: 「天龍」「龍田」を基幹戦力とした「第十八戦隊」で出撃し、オリョール海の敵主力を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Tenryuu (天龍), Tatsuta (龍田) and 2 or more other ships to World 2-3 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 海上突入部隊、進発せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B44: Sortie the Maritime Assault Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 「比叡」「霧島」「長良」「暁」「雷」「電」の艦隊で、南方海域進出作戦を実施、敵を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Hiei (比叡), Kirishima (霧島), Nagara (長良), Akatsuki (暁), Ikazuchi (雷) and Inazuma (電) to World 5-1 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第六駆逐隊」対潜哨戒を徹底なのです！
Quest.TR-Name: B45: 6th Destroyer Division's Thorough Anti-Submarine Patrol na no desu
Quest.JP-Detail: 「第六駆逐隊」を含む艦隊で鎮守府正面で対潜哨戒を実施、敵潜水艦部隊を痛打せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Akatsuki Kai2 (暁改二) as the flagship, Hibiki (響 or Верный), Ikazuchi (雷) and Inazuma (電) to World 1-5 and score an A rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第一水雷戦隊」ケ号作戦、突入せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B46: Sortie the 1st Torpedo Squadron on Operation Ke
Quest.JP-Detail: 北方突入準備を完了した「一水戦」で北方キス島に突入！包囲網を破り、友軍を救出せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Abukuma (阿武隈) as the flagship, Hibiki (響 or Верный), Hatsushimo (初霜), Wakaba (若葉), Samidare (五月雨) and Shimakaze (島風) to World 3-2 and score a victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第一水雷戦隊」北方ケ号作戦、再突入！
Quest.TR-Name: B47: Sortie the 1st Torpedo Squadron on Operation Ke Again
Quest.JP-Detail: 北方再突入準備の新編「一水戦」で北方キス島に再突入を敢行、同撤収作戦を完遂せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Abukuma Kai2 (阿武隈改二) as the flagship, Hibiki (響 or Верный), Yuugumo (夕雲), Naganami (長波), Akigumo (秋雲) and Shimakaze (島風) to World 3-2 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 「空母機動部隊」北方海域に進出せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B49: Sortie an Aircraft Carrier Task Force to the Aleutian Islands
Quest.JP-Detail: 航空母艦を旗艦とした空母機動部隊を北方AL海域方面に展開、敵戦力を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie a fleet with an CV flagship to World 3-5 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 鎮守府正面の対潜哨戒を強化せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B48: Strengthen the Anti-Submarine Patrol in Front of the Naval Base
Quest.JP-Detail: 鎮守府正面の対潜哨戒を強化し、海上資源輸送路の安全を確立せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie to World 1-5 and score 4 victories at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第五航空戦隊」珊瑚諸島沖に出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B50: Sortie the 5th CarDiv to the South
Quest.JP-Detail: 再編成した「第五航空戦隊」を珊瑚諸島沖に展開、敵機動部隊を捕捉撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Shoukaku (翔鶴), Zuikaku (瑞鶴), Oboro (朧), Akigumo (秋雲) and up to 2 additional ships to World 5-2 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 新編「第二一戦隊」北方へ出撃せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: B51: Sortie the New 21st Cruiser Division
Quest.JP-Detail: 新編「第二一戦隊」を基幹とする艦隊で北方海域モーレイ海に出撃、敵を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Nachi Kai2 (那智改二), Ashigara Kai2 (足柄改二), Tama (多摩), Kiso (木曾) and up to 2 additional ships to World 3-1 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Name: 「第十六戦隊(第一次)」出撃せよ！
Quest.JP-Detail: 「第十六戦隊(第一次)」をバシー島沖に展開、敵艦隊を撃滅せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Sortie Ashigara (足柄) as the flagship, Kuma (球磨), Nagara (長良) and up to 3 additional ships to World 2-2 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

Quest.JP-Detail: 他の提督(プレイヤー)の艦隊と「演習」を行おう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Challenge another fleet in exercises.

Quest.JP-Detail: 今週中に「演習」で他の提督の艦隊に対して20回「勝利」しよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Get 20 victories in exercises within the same week.

Quest.JP-Detail: 本日中に他の司令官の艦隊に対して3回「演習」を挑もう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Challenge 3 other fleets in exercises within the same day.

Quest.JP-Detail: 本日中に他の司令官の艦隊との「演習」で5回以上「勝利」をおさめよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Get 5 victories in exercises within the same day.

Quest.JP-Detail: 本日中に「演習」で2回以上「勝利」をおさめ、式への気持ちを整理しよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Show your love by getting 2 victories in exercises.

Quest.JP-Name: 艦隊の練度向上に努めよ！
Quest.TR-Name: C5: Improve the Efficiency of the Fleet
Quest.JP-Detail: 作戦前に艦隊の練度向上を図る！本日中に「演習」で3回以上「勝利」をおさめよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Get 3 victories in exercises within the same day.

Quest.JP-Name: 演習を強化、艦隊の練度向上に努めよ！
Quest.TR-Name: C6: Improve the Efficiency of the Fleet Again
Quest.JP-Detail: 艦隊のさらなる練度向上を図る！本日中に「演習」で4回以上「勝利」をおさめよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Get 4 victories in exercises within the same day.

Quest.JP-Name: 北方再突入に備え、練度向上に努めよ！
Quest.TR-Name: C7: Prepare for the Second Iteration of Operation Ke
Quest.JP-Detail: 艦隊再突入に備え、艦隊練度向上を図る！本日中に「演習」で4回以上「勝利」せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Get 4 victories in exercises within the same day.

Quest.JP-Detail: 同日中に「演習」で7回以上「勝利」をおさめ、我が精鋭艦隊の練度を示そう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Get 7 victories in exercises within the same day.

Quest.JP-Detail: 艦隊を「遠征」に出発させよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Perform an expedition.

Quest.JP-Detail: 本日中に「遠征」３回成功させよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Perform 3 successful expeditions within the same day.

Quest.JP-Detail: 本日中に「遠征」10回成功させよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Perform 10 successful expeditions within the same day.

Quest.JP-Detail: 今週中に「遠征」30回成功させよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Perform 30 successful expeditions within the same week.

Quest.JP-Name: 第一次潜水艦派遣作戦
Quest.JP-Detail: はじめての潜水艦派遣作戦を成功させよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete Expedition 30 (潜水艦派遣作戦).

Quest.JP-Name: 第二次潜水艦派遣作戦
Quest.JP-Detail: 第二次潜水艦派遣作戦を成功させよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete Expedition 30 (潜水艦派遣作戦) one more time.

Quest.JP-Name: 潜水艦派遣作戦による技術入手の継続！
Quest.JP-Detail: 第三次及び第四次潜水艦派遣作戦を成功させ、他国製技術の導入に努めよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete Expedition 30 (潜水艦派遣作戦) two more times.

Quest.JP-Name: 潜水艦派遣による海外艦との接触作戦
Quest.TR-Name: D8: Strategy Meeting with Overseas Submarine Dispatch
Quest.JP-Detail: 有力な潜水艦隊派遣による海外艦との接触作戦を成功させよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete expedition 31 (海外艦との接触) and receive foreign destroyer Z1!

Quest.JP-Name: 南方への輸送作戦を成功させよ！
Quest.JP-Detail: 激戦海域である南方海域への「東京急行」系遠征を敢行、これを成功させよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete expedition 37 or 38 (東京急行).

Quest.JP-Name: 南方への鼠輸送を継続実施せよ！
Quest.JP-Detail: 今週中に「東京急行」系遠征を継続的に実施、同種作戦を7回成功させよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete expedition 37 or 38 (東京急行) a total of 7 times in a week.

Quest.JP-Name: 航空火力艦の運用を強化せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: D10: Strengthen the Operation of the BBV
Quest.JP-Detail: 「航空戦艦運用演習」を実施し、航空火力艦の運用の強化に努めよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete expedition 23 (航空戦艦運用演習).

Quest.JP-Name: (続)航空火力艦の運用を強化せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: D12: Strengthen the Operation of the BBV (Cont.)
Quest.JP-Detail: 「航空戦艦運用演習」を継続実施し、航空火力艦の運用の強化に引き続き努めよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete expedition 23 (航空戦艦運用演習) 4 more times.

Quest.JP-Name: 遠洋潜水艦作戦を実施せよ！
Quest.JP-Detail: 「遠洋潜水艦作戦」を実施し、潜水艦隊の練度向上と敵艦隊漸減に努めよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete expedition 39 (遠洋潜水艦作戦).

Quest.JP-Name: 遠洋潜水艦作戦の成果を拡大せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: D14: Blue Waters Extended Submarine Operation
Quest.JP-Detail: 「遠洋潜水艦作戦」を継続実施し、潜水艦隊の練度向上と敵艦隊漸減に努めよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete expedition 39 (遠洋潜水艦作戦) 2 more times.

Quest.JP-Name: 防空射撃演習を実施せよ！
Quest.JP-Detail: 「防空射撃演習」を複数回実施し、艦隊の防空能力を高めよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete expedition 6 (防空射撃演習) 3 times.

Quest.JP-Name: 囮機動部隊支援作戦を実施せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: D16: Deploy the Decoy Task Force
Quest.JP-Detail: 「囮機動部隊支援作戦」を実施し、これを成功させよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete expedition 15 (囮機動部隊支援作戦).

Quest.JP-Name: 観艦式予行を実施せよ！
Quest.JP-Detail: 観艦式を実施する。予行として「観艦式予行」を複数回実施し、これを2回成功させよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete expedition 7 (観艦式予行) 2 times.

Quest.JP-Detail: 練度の高い艦隊で観艦式本番を実施する。「観艦式」を実施し、これを成功させよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete expedition 8 (観艦式).

Quest.JP-Name: 機動部隊の運用を強化せよ！
Quest.TR-Name: D19: Strengthen the Carrier Task Force Operations
Quest.JP-Detail: 機動部隊遠征を実施、「MO作戦」及び「敵母港空襲作戦」を展開、これを成功させよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Complete expeditions 26 (MO作戦) and 35 (敵母港空襲作戦).

Quest.JP-Detail: 補給は大事です！燃料・弾薬を艦に「補給」しよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Resupply a ship.

Quest.JP-Detail: 戦闘で傷ついた艦を「入渠」させて修理して、次の出撃に備えよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Repair a ship.

Quest.JP-Detail: 各艦隊から整備が必要な艦を5隻以上ドック入りさせ、大規模な整備をしよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Repair 5 ships.

Quest.JP-Detail: 艦隊酒保祭り！各艦に延べ15回以上の補給を実施しよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Resupply your ships 15 times.

Quest.JP-Detail: 「工廠」で鋼材などの資材を使って新しい艦を「建造」しよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Craft a ship.

Quest.JP-Detail: 「工廠」でボーキサイトなどの資材を使って新しい装備アイテムを「開発」しよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Craft a piece of equipment.

Quest.JP-Detail: 「工廠」で不要な艦を「解体」してみよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Dismantle a ship.

Quest.JP-Detail: 「工廠」で不要な装備アイテムを「廃棄」してみよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Scrap a piece of equipment.

Quest.JP-Detail: 「工廠」で装備アイテムを新たに「開発」しよう(失敗もOK)！
Quest.TR-Detail: Craft a piece of equipment. (Failures are OK)

Quest.JP-Detail: 「工廠」で艦娘を本日中に新たに「建造」しよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Craft a ship.

Quest.JP-Detail: 「工廠」で装備アイテムを本日中に3回「開発」しよう(失敗もOK)！
Quest.TR-Detail: Craft 3 pieces of equipment. (Failures are OK)

Quest.JP-Detail: 艦隊強化のため、「工廠」で艦娘を本日中に3隻「建造」しよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Craft 3 ships.

Quest.JP-Detail: 少し艦隊規模が大きくなりすぎました！「工廠」で不要な艦を2隻「解体」してください！
Quest.TR-Detail: Scrap 2 ships.

Quest.JP-Detail: 大型艦建造の準備をします！「工廠」で装備アイテムを4回「廃棄」してみてください！
Quest.TR-Detail: Scrap equipment 4 times.

Quest.JP-Detail: 式の準備をします！「工廠」で装備アイテムを2回「廃棄」して身の回りの整理を！
Quest.TR-Detail: Scrap equipment 2 times to show your love!

Quest.JP-Name: 輸送用ドラム缶の準備
Quest.JP-Detail: 「工廠」で装備アイテムを3回「廃棄」して、輸送用のドラム缶を準備します。
Quest.TR-Detail: Scrap equipment 3 times to acquire a shipping barrel.

Quest.JP-Detail: 「工廠」で余剰の装備アイテムをなるべく多く「廃棄」して、鋼材の再利用に努めよう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Scrap equipment 24 times.

Quest.JP-Detail: 「九七式艦攻(友永隊)」搭載空母を秘書艦にした状態で新たに「天山」を2つ廃棄！
Quest.TR-Detail: With an aircraft carrier equipped with Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Tomonaga Squadron) as your secretary, scrap 2 Tenzans (simultaneously) to upgrade the Type 97 to Tenzan Model 12 (Tomonaga Squadron). The Type 97 must not be locked or you'll lose the Tenzans.

Quest.JP-Detail: 「九九式艦爆(江草隊)」搭載空母を秘書艦にした状態で新たに「彗星」を2つ廃棄！
Quest.TR-Detail: With an aircraft carrier equipped with Type 99 Dive Bomber (Ekusa Squadron) as your secretary, scrap 2 Suiseis (simultaneously) to upgrade the Type 99 to Suisei (Ekusa Squadron). The Type 99 must not be locked or you'll lose the Suiseis.

Quest.JP-Detail: 「零戦52型丙(六〇一空)」搭載空母を秘書艦にした状態で新たに「烈風」を2つ廃棄！
Quest.TR-Detail: With an aircraft carrier equipped with Zero Fighter Type 52 Type C (601 Air Group) as your secretary, scrap 2 Reppuus to upgrade the Type 52 to Reppuu (601 Air Group). The Type 52 must not be locked or you'll lose the Reppuus.

Quest.JP-Detail: 「工廠」で不要な装備アイテムをいくつか「廃棄」して、新型給糧艦召喚の準備をしましょう！
Quest.TR-Detail: Scrap equipment 10 times.

Quest.JP-Detail: 「改修工廠」で「装備」を改修してみましょう！明石さん、お願いします！
Quest.TR-Detail: Perform equipment modernisation once.

Quest.JP-Detail: 「改修工廠」で「装備」の改修強化に努めます。
Quest.TR-Detail: Perform equipment modernisation once.

Quest.JP-Detail: 「九七式艦攻(村田隊)」搭載「翔鶴」を秘書艦にして、新たに「天山」を2つ廃棄！
Quest.TR-Detail: With Shoukaku equipped with a Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Murata Squadron)‎ as your secretary, scrap 2 Tenzans to upgrade the Type 97 to Tenzan Model 12 (Murata Squadron).

Quest.JP-Name: 精鋭「九七式艦攻」部隊の編成
Quest.TR-Name: F19: Formation of the Elite Type 97 Torpedo Bomber Squadron
Quest.JP-Detail: 「翔鶴」または「赤城」を秘書艦にした状態で新たに「九七式艦攻」を3つ廃棄！
Quest.TR-Detail: With Shoukaku (翔鶴) or Akagi (赤城) as your secretary, dismantle 3 Type 97 Torpedo Bombers to obtain a Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Murata Squadron)‎.

Quest.JP-Name: はじめての「近代化改修」！
Quest.JP-Detail: 任意の艦を近代化改修(合成)して、強化せよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Perform a successful modernization.

Quest.JP-Name: 艦の「近代化改修」を実施せよ！
Quest.JP-Detail: 近代化改修を実施して、２回以上これを成功させよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Perform 2 successful modernizations within the same day.

Quest.JP-Name: 「近代化改修」を進め、戦備を整えよ！
Quest.JP-Detail: 一週間の間に、近代化改修を１5回成功させよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Perform 15 successful modernizations within the same week.

Quest.JP-Detail: 大型艦/新型艦建造のための準備を行う。任意の艦で近代化改修を4回成功させよ！
Quest.TR-Detail: Perform 4 successful modernizations.
